document_data.name: Iron Way
document_data.refs: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|82}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 62 Khôltar, Part 13, High Khôltar}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Iron Way''' was a street in [[Khôltar]], [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|62}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 50: Khôltar, Part 1, First Impressions}}
document_data.Description: The Iron Way ran north–south, beginning and ending at [[Suldroon Street]] and [[Erethorn's Ride]]. As one approached the midpoint of the street, it split into two lanes that formed a large circular road that surrounded [[High Khôltar]], the imposing black stone fortress that was the residence of the Belarkh (ruling lord) of the Iron City. At either end of the Iron Way, and running along the two terminus streets in both directions, were the klathlaaedin (ornately sculpted mansions) of various [[Onsruur]] (council of lords) families.
